name: Figma Tailwindcss
description:
Figma Tailwindcss lets you export aspects of a design made in Figma to a javascript theme file that can easily be used with Tailwindcss.


Creating your theme

The plugin gets it's info from the Local Styles. At this point it picks up:


  • colors
  • font-families
  • text-sizes
  • box-shadows
  • borded-radius


Full docs: https://github.com/jan-dh/figma-tailwindcss/
